entry.summary: ***NOTICE TO ATTORNEY TO RE-FILE DOCUMENT - EVENT TYPE ERROR. Notice to Attorney Paven Malhotra to RE-FILE Document (820 in 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW) MOTION to Seal Defendants Opposition to Motion for Protective Order regarding 30(b)(6) Topics 2, 5, and 20., (822 in 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW, 1013 in 1:23-cv-11195-SHS-OTW) MOTION to Seal Defendants Opposition to Motion for Protective Order regarding 30(b)(6) Topics 2, 5, and 20 (corrected).. Use the event type When asked, Is this a Letter Motion?, click the Yes radio button, then complete the Docket Entry as Instructed. Select Seal found under the Available Events list. Filed In Associated Cases: 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW, 1:23-cv-11195-SHS-OTW(kj)
